title: Version 4.1ε
subtitle: Even Faster Page Loading
body: When using a modern browser, pages load even faster with new internal features.

title: Version 4.0ε
subtitle: A Complete Internal and External Redesign of the Site
body: Version 4.0ε redesigns the UI of the site with CSS grid everywhere, consistent colours and a dark theme, and a new code page with new HTML tests.

title: All About the Site Redesign
subtitle: Learn all about the Epsilon Update Redesign

title: Internal Changes in Epsilon Update
subtitle: How the new Features Happened
body: Learn about the internal changes in the Epsilon Update, including the CSS animations, MDC Components JS, and new Grid Features.

title: My First Test With WASM
subtitle: See it on the Code Page
body: About my experience setting up Emscripten, and using Web Assembly.

title: objectStorage System
subtitle: A new internal system
body: objectStorage adds features to JavaScript's built in methods to allow you to use getObject and setObject for localStorage and sessionStorage.
